title: Might Have Been
description: Trapped by bad decisions and a troubled girlfriend, an underachieving young physicist discovers the key to his past and his future â€“ a device that transports him to eight choices with eight unforgettable women that will change his life by revealing what might have been. With memorable characters, and a complex story suffused with a witty sensuality, Might Have Been is a genre-exploding adventure into sex, second chances, quantum mechanics, and the hope of love.
author: Jeremy Sterling
